au.com.agic.apptesting.steps

Class InitialisationStepDefinitions

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.com.agic.apptesting.steps.InitialisationStepDefinitions

  • @Component
public class InitialisationStepDefinitions
extends java.lang.Object
    Gherkin steps that are used to initialise the test script. These steps have Atom snipptets that start with the prefix "set". See https://github.com/mcasperson/iridium-snippets for more details.

    • Method Detail

      • setKeystrokeDelay

        @When(value="^I set the default keystroke delay to \"(\\d+)\" milliseconds$")
public void setKeystrokeDelay(java.lang.Integer delay)
        Sets the default amount of time to wait between simulated key presses
        Parameters:
        delay - The number of milliseconds to pause between simulated key presses

      • setDefaultSleepTime

        @When(value="^I set the default wait time between steps to \"(\\d+(?:\\.\\d+)?)\"(?: seconds?)?$")
public void setDefaultSleepTime(java.lang.String numberOfSeconds)
        This step can be used to define the amount of time each additional step will wait before continuing. This is useful for web applications that pop new elements into the page in response to user interaction, as there can be a delay before those elements are available.

        Set this to 0 to make each step execute immediately after the last one.

        Parameters:
        numberOfSeconds - The number of seconds to wait before each step completes

      • setDefaultWaitTime

        @When(value="^I set the default wait for elements to be available to \"(\\d+)\"(?: seconds?)?$")
public void setDefaultWaitTime(java.lang.Integer numberOfSeconds)
        When elements are requested by steps in Iridium, an optional wait time can be defined that will allow the script to account for elements that might not yet be present. This wait time is set to Constants.WAIT by default, and can be overriden with this step.
        Parameters:
        numberOfSeconds - The number of seconds to wait for elements to be available before continuing with a step

      • pageObjectMappings

        @Given(value="^(?:I set )?the alias mappings")
public void pageObjectMappings(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> aliasTable)
        Takes a gerkin table and saves the key value pairs (key being alias names referenced in other steps).
        Parameters:
        aliasTable - The key value pairs

      • configureAutoaliasing

        @Given(value="^I set autoaliasing to \"((?:true)|(?:false))\"$")
public void configureAutoaliasing(java.lang.String enabled)
        Enables or disables autoaliasing.
        Parameters:
        enabled - set to true or false

      • enableAutoaliasing

        @Given(value="^I enable autoaliasing$")
public void enableAutoaliasing()
        Enables autoaliasing.

      • disableAutoaliasing

        @Given(value="^I disable autoaliasing$")

        Disables autoaliasing.
